statements: SELECT * FROM luxury_properties;
SELECT property_name, property_location FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_price > 100000;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_location = 'New York' AND property_price < 1500000;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM luxury_properties ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT COUNT(property_id) FROM luxury_properties;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_price > 100000 ORDER BY property_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT property_name, property_location FROM luxury_properties WHERE virtual_reality_support = TRUE ORDER BY property_location DESC, property_name ASC
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_location LIKE '%Beverly Hills%' AND virtual_tour_link IS NOT NULL AND virtual_reality_support = TRUE
SELECT DISTINCT property_location FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_price BETWEEN 50000 AND 200000 GROUP BY property_location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT property_name, property_price, virtual_tour_link FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_price = (SELECT MAX(property_price) FROM luxury_properties)
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties;
SELECT property_name, property_location, property_price FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_type = 'villa';
SELECT property_name, property_location, property_price FROM luxury_properties ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_location, property_price FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_location LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT property_name, property_type, property_price FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_price > 500000;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties ORDER BY property_price DESC, property_name ASC, property_location
SELECT property_name, property_type, property_price FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_type = 'Villa' ORDER BY property_price ASC
SELECT property_name, property_location, property_price FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_location LIKE '%Beach%' OR property_location LIKE '%Mountain%' ORDER BY property_location
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_price > 500000 AND property_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT property_name, tour_name, tour_duration FROM luxury_properties JOIN virtual_tours ON luxury_properties.property_id = virtual_tours.property_id
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_location FROM luxury_properties ORDER BY property_location DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_image_url FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_id = 3;
SELECT tour_id, tour_name, tour_description FROM virtual_tours WHERE tour_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, client_name, rating FROM client_feedback WHERE rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties;
SELECT property_name, property_location, property_image_url FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_location='Los Angeles';
SELECT property_name, property_location, property_description FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_id=3;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_description FROM luxury_properties ORDER BY property_id DESC;

SELECT p.property_name, v.tour_name, c.client_name FROM luxury_properties p JOIN virtual_tours v ON p.property_id = v.property_id JOIN client_feedback c ON v.tour_id = c.tour_id WHERE c.rating >= 4.0;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties;
SELECT id, property_name, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT property_type, location FROM luxury_properties ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT property_name, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_tours INNER JOIN luxury_properties ON virtual_tours.property_id = luxury_properties.id;
SELECT property_name, location, price FROM luxury_properties;
SELECT * FROM virtual_tours WHERE tour_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT tour_name, property_name, interaction_date FROM virtual_tours JOIN tour_interactions ON virtual_tours.id = tour_interactions.tour_id;
SELECT location, property_type FROM luxury_properties WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM property;
SELECT property_name, property_id, property_price FROM property WHERE property_price > 100000;
SELECT property_name, property_location FROM property WHERE property_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client WHERE client_budget > 500000;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM property WHERE property_location = 'New York';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client WHERE client_budget >= 500000 ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT tour_id, property_id, client_id, tour_date FROM tour ORDER BY tour_date DESC, tour_id ASC;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM property WHERE property_price > 100000 ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT vr_id, tour_id, vr_technology FROM virtual_reality WHERE vr_technology LIKE '%Oculus%' ORDER BY vr_id ASC;
